post.description: Authenticate user with email and password credentials. Returns access and refresh tokens upon successful authentication.

200.description: Authentication successful - Returns access and refresh tokens

400.description: Bad request - Invalid email format or missing fields

401.description: Invalid credentials or email not verified

post.summary: Sign in with email and password

example.message: We have sent a verification email to your inbox

400.description: Bad Request - Validation error or account already exists

message: email must be an email
password must be longer than or equal to 8 characters
password must contain uppercase, lowercase, number and special character
Email already registered

400.description: Invalid or expired token
Bad Request - Too many requests or invalid email

message: email must be an email
Too many verification requests

post.summary: Get status for resend verification (allowed / wait time)

200.description: Password reset email sent (if email exists)

example.message: If the email exists in our system, you will receive a link to reset your password.
Password reset successfully. You can now log in with your new password.

400.description: Invalid token or password requirements not met

example.message: The recovery link is invalid or has expired.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid password or validation error

message: currentPassword must be a string
newPassword must be longer than or equal to 8 characters
newPassword must contain uppercase, lowercase, number and special character
Current password is incorrect

post.description: Generate new access and refresh tokens using a valid refresh token. Useful when the access token has expired.

400.description: Bad request - Missing refresh token

401.description: Invalid, expired, or revoked refresh token

post.summary: Refresh tokens using a refresh token

400.description: Invalid Account ID

post.description: Authenticate user using a Google Access Token obtained from a mobile device.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid role or operation

message: role must be one of: user, moderator, admin
You cannot change your own role

400.description: Bad Request - Validation error. Invalid field values

message: name must be longer than or equal to 3 characters
phoneNumber must match phone format
gender must be one of: male, female
language must be one of: english, spanish
fitGoals must contain at least 1 elements

400.description: Bad Request - Validation error or Profile already exists

message: name must be longer than or equal to 3 characters
phoneNumber must match phone format
gender must be one of: male, female
language must be one of: english, spanish
fitGoals must contain at least 1 elements
Profile already exists for this account

get.description: Get all measurements. Only accessible by administrators.
Retrieve the authenticated user's current measurement.

post.description: Create a new measurement or update existing one for authenticated user.

400.description: Bad Request - Validation error. Invalid or missing required fields

message: weight must be a positive number
height must be a positive number
left_arm must be a positive number
checkTime must be one of: DAILY, WEEKLY, MONTHLY

400.description: Bad Request - Validation error. Invalid field values

message: weight must be a positive number
checkTime must be one of: DAILY, WEEKLY, MONTHLY

get.summary: Get a measurement by id (admin use)

post.description: Create a new split. Any authenticated user can create splits. Official flag is automatically set to false.

data.name: Upper/Lower
data.description: 4-day weekly program split into upper and lower.

400.description: Bad Request - Validation error. Invalid or missing required fields

message: name must be longer than or equal to 3 characters
description must be longer than or equal to 10 characters
trainingDays must contain at least 1 elements
routineIds must contain at least 1 elements

get.description: Get a paginated list of all splits. Accessible by all authenticated users. This action updates the user daily streak.

items.name: Upper/Lower
items.description: 4-day weekly program split into upper and lower.

get.description: Retrieve a specific split by its ID. Accessible by all authenticated users.

data.name: Upper/Lower
data.description: 4-day weekly program split into upper and lower.

patch.description: Update a split. Only the owner of the split or users with ADMIN role can update it.

data.name: Upper/Lower
data.description: 4-day weekly program split into upper and lower.

400.description: Bad Request - Validation error. Invalid field values

message: name must be longer than or equal to 3 characters
trainingDays must contain at least 1 elements

403.description: Forbidden - You can only modify splits that belong to you

delete.description: Delete a split. Only the owner of the split or users with ADMIN role can delete it.

403.description: Forbidden - You can only delete splits that belong to you

post.description: Create a new routine. Any authenticated user can create routines. Routines created by ADMIN users are automatically marked as official.

data.name: Upper/Lower Hypertrophy
data.description: 4-day program focused on strength and hypertrophy.

400.description: Bad Request - Validation error. Invalid or missing required fields

message: name must be longer than or equal to 3 characters
description must be longer than or equal to 10 characters
exerciseIds must contain at least 1 elements
routineGoal must contain at least 1 elements

get.description: Get a paginated list of all routines. Accessible by all authenticated users. This action updates the user daily streak.

items.name: Upper/Lower Hypertrophy
items.description: 4-day program focused on strength and hypertrophy.

get.description: Retrieve a specific routine by its ID. Accessible by all authenticated users.

patch.description: Update a routine. Only the owner of the routine or users with ADMIN role can update it.

400.description: Bad Request - Validation error. Invalid field values

message: name must be longer than or equal to 3 characters
exerciseIds must contain at least 1 elements

403.description: Forbidden - You can only modify routines that belong to you

delete.description: Delete a routine. Only the owner of the routine or users with ADMIN role can delete it.

403.description: Forbidden - You can only delete routines that belong to you

items.title: Rutina completada
items.message: Has completado tu rutina de fuerza.

post.description: Create a new exercise. Only accessible by users with ADMIN role.

400.description: Bad Request - Validation error. Invalid or missing required fields

message: name must be longer than or equal to 3 characters
description must be longer than or equal to 10 characters
equipment must be one of: barbell, dumbbell, machine, bodyweight, kettlebell, resistance_band, cable, other
muscleTarget must contain at least 1 elements
exerciseType must contain at least 1 elements

403.description: Forbidden - Only administrators can create exercises

get.description: Get a paginated list of all exercises. Filter by muscle target to get specific exercises. Accessible by all authenticated users.

parameters.name: muscleTarget
parameters.description: Filter by target muscles. Valid values: chest, core, trapezius, lats, deltoids, triceps, biceps, forearms, quads, hamstrings, glutes, adductors, calves, neck

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid muscleTarget value

message: Each muscleTarget must be one of: chest, core, trapezius, lats, deltoids, triceps, biceps, forearms, quads, hamstrings, glutes, adductors, calves, neck

get.description: Retrieve a specific exercise by its ID. Accessible by all authenticated users.

patch.description: Update an existing exercise. Only accessible by users with ADMIN role.

400.description: Bad Request - Validation error. Invalid field values

message: name must be longer than or equal to 3 characters
equipment must be one of: barbell, dumbbell, machine, bodyweight, kettlebell, resistance_band, cable, other
muscleTarget must contain at least 1 elements

403.description: Forbidden - Only administrators can update exercises

delete.description: Delete an exercise. Only accessible by users with ADMIN role.

403.description: Forbidden - Only administrators can delete exercises

birthDate.description: Birth date in ISO format (user must be 18+)

language.description: Language preference - Valid values: english, spanish

fitGoals.description: Fitness goals - Valid values: weight_loss, muscle_gain, weight_maintenance, endurance, flexibility, general_fitness, rehabilitation, improved_posture, balance_and_coordination, cardiovascular_health, strength_training, athletic_performance, lifestyle_enhancement

state.description: Account status - Valid values: ACTIVE, SUSPENDED, DEACTIVATED

role.description: Assigned role - Valid values: user, admin, moderator

language.description: Language preference - Valid values: english, spanish

fitGoals.description: Fitness goals - Valid values: weight_loss, muscle_gain, weight_maintenance, endurance, flexibility, general_fitness, rehabilitation, improved_posture, balance_and_coordination, cardiovascular_health, strength_training, athletic_performance, lifestyle_enhancement

birthDate.description: Birth date in ISO format (user must be 18+)

exerciseType.description: Exercise types - Valid values: cardio, strength, flexibility, hiit, pilates, yoga, crossfit, calisthenics, aerobics, endurance, powerlifting, olympic_weightlifting, bodybuilding, functional_training, rehabilitation, sports_specific, warm_up, cool_down
